name: Automated Pentesting Tool
body: Developed a custom Command and Control (C2) framework focused on privilege escalation and post-exploitation. Researched and implemented payload execution and post-exploitation techniques on the C2 agent using the Go language. Also implemented measures to evade the Elastic Stack's security features

name: Portfolio Website
body: This portfolio website to show my experience and skills. Information on this webpage is populated through JSON files, allowing me to easily update and modify content on the site
